attributes.action: Improve funding for mental health services.
attributes.additional_details: MH services...other than IAPT, which only ever addresses the issues of the worried well...have for a long time been woefully underfunded & thus inadequate. Given these straitened times, they can only get worse....unless the government intervenes with more funding & minimum service requirements for ICBs/ICNs
attributes.background: Call on the government to increase funding for - & accountability of - mental health services in light of Met police decision not to attend "routine" mental health calls

rejection.details: Increase funding for all mental health services: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634345
